With a deep groan, Tucson slowly awakens, and again, when he opens his eyes=
, he sees nothing but darkness, as it was natural for him to have no sight.=
  He sighs, while directing his head over to Rodimus, while listening to se=
e if he's coming around as well.  He slowly draws his right knee up onto th=
e bench, and then slowly sits up.  The voices a mere memory, as he tries to=
 concentrate on Rodimus's condition.  

" R - Rodimus?  Stanton? How - how =
is Rodimus?  Did - it work?"

Rat Trap watches from the other side, looking=
 rather excited as does Straight Shot. 

"Guys, guys, look!  Rodimus is com=
mn' around!  He did it, Wheels did it!"

Straight Shot smiles as she points=
 to inside the room, with Elita still in her arms.

"See?!  What'd I tell y=
a?!  Look, your dad's comming around, he's gonna be okay!  WHOOHOO!  Way ta=
 go Tucson!

Night Shift jumps for joy as does Quickstride.

"Now that's wh=
at I'm talkn' about!  I knew he'd kick aft in there!"

Straight Shot looks =
into the room, and notices an expression on Tucson's face, which gave an ai=
r of concern.

"Hmm, Tucson still looks as if he's prepared to fend somethi=
ng off, like as if something may be watching him..  I wonder what it is..."=
